segments.text: I notice the woman at the sink with a towel in hand, completely absorbed in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her brow is furrowed with concentration, and I smile at the domesticity of it all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But then I see the water overflowing; it sends a chill down my spine.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel anger bubbling up inside me; how can she not see what’s happening?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool looks so comically bold, reaching deep into the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His excitement is infectious, but the danger cannot be ignored.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl next to him is waiting with an open palm, her eyes sparkling with hope.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think how reckless this all seems; what kind of trouble are they asking for?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their innocence tugs at my heart, but the reality of the situation weighs heavily on me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s strange how a moment can be so full of life yet so precariously balanced.
segments.speaker: PAR
